__TOC__

This page keeps track of the current release status of the Desktop Experience Team (aka Unity Team)

=== What was done engineering wise? ===

* Upload of 5.10.0-ubuntu5, with fixes for:
** software-center install animation making the display useless on netbooks (LP: <nowiki>[[Bug:981168]]</nowiki>)
** Shortcut keys in workspace section of the shortcut overlay aren't translated. (LP: <nowiki>[[Bug:980828]]</nowiki>)

* Preparation for <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/unity/+milestone/5.12.0|Unity 5.12.0]]</nowiki> and related components (2d & Compiz)

=== What's about to land that might impact the other teams? ===

* No 0-day SRU planned at this stage
* We are preparing for a <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/unity/+milestone/5.12.0|Unity 5.12.0]]</nowiki> upload into -proposed somewhere next week, to have enough testing time for a release around UDS

=== Dependencies on other teams, blocking items ===

* None

=== Release targeted bugs being worked on/monitored ===

http://reports.qa.ubuntu.com/reports/kernel-bugs/reports/rls-mgr-p-tracking-bugs.html
